content:
This is mainly out of curiosity/to improve the way I do search, but how do people here search through lean libraries? For mathlib4 I generally find myself using the loogle website a lot (since, by vscode's limitation, there's no unicode character typing for vscode-loogle), and I occasionally use leansearch.net if I have no grounding lean knowledge for what I'm looking for.

Though, for libraries that depend on mathlib4, I generally have a much harder time searching for theorems, and I usually just rely on mathlib4's #find.
I haven't! Thanks! :+1:
Tristan Figueroa-Reid has marked this topic as resolved.
